alert.note: Alert for Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 11 at 9:42PM MDT until May 12 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Teller County and the Rampart Range. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft
